name: HM01
flavor_text: The target is cut with a scythe or claw. This can also be used to cut down thin trees.

name: HM02
flavor_text: The user soars and then strikes its target on the next turn. This can also be used to fly to any familiar town.

name: HM03
flavor_text: The user attacks everything around it by swamping its surroundings with a giant wave.

name: HM04
flavor_text: The target is slugged with a punch thrown at maximum power. This can also be used to move heavy boulders.

name: HM05
flavor_text: The user charges at the target and may make it flinch. This can also be used to climb a waterfall.

name: HM06
flavor_text: The user attacks with a punch. This may also lower the target’s Defense stat. This move can also shatter rocks in the field.

name: HM07
flavor_text: Diving on the first turn, the user floats up and attacks on the next turn.

name: HM08
flavor_text: A charging attack that may also leave the foe confused. It can also be used to scale rocky walls.

name: Explorer Kit
flavor_text: A bag filled with convenient tools for exploring. It provides access to the Underground in the Sinnoh region.

name: Loot Sack
flavor_text: A sturdy, spacious bag that is used to carry any treasures or loot obtained in the coal mine.

name: Rule Book
flavor_text: It lists the rules for holding battles. For Link Battles, you may choose which set of rules you wish to use.

name: Poké Radar
flavor_text: A tool that can search out Pokémon that are hiding in the tall grass. Its battery is recharged as you walk.

name: Point Card
flavor_text: A card that lists how many Battle Points you have earned.

name: Journal
flavor_text: A notebook that keeps a day-to-day record of your adventure so far.

name: Fashion Case

name: Seal Bag
flavor_text: A tiny bag that can hold 10 Seals for decorating Poké Balls.

name: Pal Pad
flavor_text: A convenient notepad that is used to register your Friends and friend codes and keep a record of your gameplay.

name: Works Key
flavor_text: A large key for operating the doors of the Valley Windworks in the canyon. It was held by a Team Galactic Grunt.

name: Old Charm
flavor_text: An ancient good-luck charm made of Pokémon bones to be taken to the elder of Celestic Town.

name: Galactic Key
flavor_text: A card key for disengaging the security systems in the Galactic HQ. Losing it can result in punishment, apparently.

name: Red Chain
flavor_text: A mythical chain that is said to link the Legendary Pokémon that created the Sinnoh region.

name: Town Map
flavor_text: A very convenient map that can be viewed anytime. It even shows you your present location in the region.

name: Vs. Seeker
flavor_text: A device that indicates Trainers who want to battle. Its battery charges while you walk.

name: Coin Case
flavor_text: A case for holding coins obtained at the Game Corner. It can hold up to 50,000 coins.

name: Old Rod
flavor_text: An old and beat-up fishing rod. Use it at any body of water to fish for wild aquatic Pokémon.

name: Good Rod
flavor_text: A new, good-quality fishing rod. Use it at any body of water to fish for wild aquatic Pokémon.

name: Super Rod
flavor_text: An awesome, high-tech fishing rod. Use it at any body of water to fish for wild aquatic Pokémon.

name: Sprayduck

name: Poffin Case
flavor_text: A case for storing Poffins cooked from Berries.

name: Bicycle
flavor_text: A folding Bicycle that enables a rider to get around much faster than a pair of Running Shoes will allow.

name: Suite Key
flavor_text: A key to one of the suites at a certain luxury hotel by a lake. For some odd reason, it often disappears.

name: Oak’s Letter

name: Lunar Wing
flavor_text: A feather that glows like the moon. It’s said to possess the power to dispel nightmares.

name: Member Card
flavor_text: A card needed for entering the inn in Canalave City. Oddly, the last date marked on it was 50 years ago.

name: Azure Flute

name: S.S. Ticket

name: Contest Pass

name: Magma Stone
flavor_text: A stone formed by boulders melting in intensely hot magma, then hardening. Magma remains sealed inside it.

name: Parcel

name: Coupon 1

name: Vs. Recorder

name: Gracidea

name: Heavy Ball

name: Love Ball

flavor_text: A special Poké Ball for the Pal Park.

flavor_text: A catalog of devices that Rotom like. Use the catalog to have Rotom hop in and out of the various devices listed within.

name: Rusted Shield
flavor_text: It is said that a hero used this shield to halt a terrible disaster in ancient times. But it's grown rusty and worn.

name: Rusted Sword
flavor_text: It is said that a hero used this sword to halt a terrible disaster in ancient times. But it's grown rusty and worn.

name: Salad Mix
flavor_text: One of the many ingredients that can be used for cooking at your camp. The assortment of vegetables looks quite appealing and healthy.

name: Sassy Mint
flavor_text: When a Pokémon smells this mint, its Sp. Def will grow more easily, but its Speed will grow more slowly.

name: Sausages
flavor_text: One of the many ingredients that can be used for cooking at your camp. These sausages should be boiled before eating.

name: Serious Mint
flavor_text: When a Pokémon smells this mint, all of its stats will grow at an equal rate.

name: Shaderoot Carrot
flavor_text: Produce that the King of Bountiful Harvests' beloved steed likes to eat. It grew in a gloomy field.

name: Smoke-Poke Tail
flavor_text: One of the many ingredients that can be used for cooking at your camp. When a Slowpoke's tail falls off, it grows back quickly.

name: Sonia’s Book
flavor_text: Professor Sonia's published writings. Her new discoveries about the Galar region's legends are recorded in this enjoyable read.

name: Spice Mix
flavor_text: One of the many ingredients that can be used for cooking at your camp. There are over fifty spices contained within this ingredient's hot flavor.

name: Star Sweet
flavor_text: A star-shaped sweet. When a Milcery holds this, it spins around happily.

name: Strawberry Sweet
flavor_text: A strawberry-shaped sweet. When a Milcery holds this, it will spin around happily.

name: Style Card
flavor_text: A card that increases the selection in boutiques and hair salons.

name: Sweet Apple
flavor_text: A peculiar apple that can make a certain species of Pokémon evolve. It's exceptionally sweet.

name: Tart Apple
flavor_text: A peculiar apple that can make a certain species of Pokémon evolve. It's exceptionally tart.

name: Throat Spray
flavor_text: Raises Sp. Atk when a Pokémon uses a sound-based move.

name: Timid Mint
flavor_text: When a Pokémon smells this mint, its Speed will grow more easily, but its Attack will grow more slowly.

name: Tin of Beans
flavor_text: One of the many ingredients that can be used for cooking at your camp. When simmered, the beans suffuse a dish with their mild flavor.

name: Utility Umbrella
flavor_text: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This sturdy umbrella protects the holder from the effects of rain and harsh sunlight.

name: White Mane Hair
flavor_text: Mane hair that belonged to the King of Bountiful Harvests' beloved steed, Glastrier. The hair is strong and very flexible.

name: Wishing Piece
flavor_text: Throw one into a Pokémon Den to attract a wild Dynamax Pokémon.

name: Wishing Star
flavor_text: A stone found in the Galar region with a mysterious power. It's said that your dreams come true if you find one.

name: Wooden Crown
flavor_text: A mysterious object made of wood. Part of it seems to be chipped. Maybe it's meant to be part of something.
